prompt: chiikawastyle, hachiiware, usagi, chiikawa, this is a digital drawing in a cute, chibi anime style. it features three adorable, round, anthropomorphic animals standing side by side on a grassy field with a few scattered flowers. on the left is hachiiware,it has a white cat with blue ears, a small camera around its neck, and a pink bag. in the center is chiikawa,it has a white bear with a pink bowtie, holding a pink bag. on the right is usagi,it has a beige bunny with long ears and a pink bow. in the top left corner, a knight in armor and a brown cloak peeks out from behind a tree, looking surprised. the background is a soft green, giving a whimsical and playful feel.
